@@ -186,6 +186,7 @@ QT_TRANSLATE_NOOP("bitcoin-core", "Specify configuration file (default: bitcoin.

+QT_TRANSLATE_NOOP("bitcoin-core", "Wallet %s resides outside data directory %s\n"),

 QT_TRANSLATE_NOOP("bitcoin-core", "Warning"),
